name: Neon Fusion (itch)
description:
A platform action game in development with game maker studio!

(DEMO VERSION)

Amber is a simple soldier. But a help signal make everything changes.

Rescue lost members in a great space station in this metroidvania like game. With a tons of weapons'n bullets combinations using a mix system!! Be ready to run through a long corridors, filled with corrupted monsters and out control machines. Everything in a unique and stylish environment of neon colors.

-Controls-

Z: Jump / Accept

X: Shoot / Back

C: Dash

Shift: Toggle Map

Enter : Inventory

compatible with xbox controller
